channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine Deploying ‘Tens Of Thousands’ Of Interceptors To Stop Shaheds
item.description: Ukraine is massively scaling up its production of low-cost interceptor drones to stop Russia's growing barrages of Shahed attack drones.
